duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, modify, and analyze new and existing nuclear power plant electrical systems.
Prepare and review engineering design change packages for equipment installation, replacement, and upgrade.
Participate in bid review evaluation process for potential equipment vendors and support vendor requests for additional information.
Interface with project team members from other engineering and design disciplines.
Attend client meetings and site field walkdowns to validate scope and ensure client satisfaction.
Support site installation activities during project implementation and ensure projects are completed satisfactorily, on time, and within budget.
Initiate and convey scope of work to project team members, define deliverables, review status and track progress, submit progress reports, and resolve open items and emergent project issues.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in Electrical Engineering from an ABET-accredited engineering program
